sentences.sContent: We've got to get the economy under control or it will literally eat us up.
sentences.sCn: 我们必须控制住经济，否则它真地就会把我们困住。

words.tran: 文字的；逐字的；无夸张的
拘泥于字句；直译主义；彻底写实主义
文字，字义上；无修饰；表面意义上
拘泥于字句；照字面意义解释

trans.tranOther: You can use literally to emphasize an exaggeration. Some careful speakers of English think that this use is incorrect.
